name: 3D Rasterizer
desc: 512x512 image renderer written in C++. Supports antialiasing up to 16x, importing .OBJ files, and Lambertian and Blinn-Phong shading. Uses Qt for everything else.

name: RCW
alt: Screenshot of my game's main menu
desc: Endless Unity minigame written in C#. UI was prototyped and exported from Figma. Color-based gameplay inspired by the Stroop effect. Play from your browser now!

name: wikiRank
desc: Made with friends. Enter text (think journal articles, research papers) and let the vector space model analyze your keywords to find and rank the most relevant Wikipedia articles.

name: aczw.dev
alt: Screenshot of my old website's homepage
desc: v1 of my site. Next.js was overkill for my purposes, and everything was too big, but many ideas have carried over. Kept alive for sentimental value :)

name: Scallop Playground
desc: Scallop is a neurosymbolic language for deep learning and LLMs. I'm currently helping to build a web platform to create, save, and publish custom Scallop user projects. Employs a Next.js frontend, Flask backend, and PlanetScale for storing data.

name: sddm-theme-corners
desc: Extremely customizable login theme for SDDM, a Linux session manager. Written in QML and uses Qt Quick. Has 60+ stars on GitHub if that counts for anything.

name: charl.sh
desc: How meta! This site was built with Astro, a little React, and Tailwind. Display font is Atkinson Hyperlegible, monospace is Maple Mono. Icons from Lucide.

name: ttt
alt: Screenshot showing a tic-tac-toe game in progress
desc: It's just tic-tac-toe. Small little project that finally made React click for me.
